Commentary.ab: Y19.15a hamō kāraiiat̰] Kellens suggests hāmō.kāraiiat̰ from *ham-akāraiiat̰ (impf.).

Y19.15d-f] adaptation of Y45.2. The Avestan words present mostly a mixture of Old Avestan features (in the middle of the word) and Young Avestan fetaures (short vowel ending). We have tried to keep a coherence within the stanza.
Y19.15d sə̄ŋha] OAv. sə̄ṇghā, YAv. saŋha. Sec. cod. sə̄ŋha; Geldner, Kellens saŋha.
Y19.15e varana] OAv. varanā, YAv. varəna. Cod. vv. ll.: varanā, varəna, varənā, but VIrS mostly varana. Geldner, Kellens varəna.
Y19.15e š́iiaōϑana] OAv. š́iiaōϑanā, YAv. š́iiaōϑna. Cod. vv. ll.: š́iiaōϑana (mostly Ir.), š́iiaōϑna (mostly Ind.). Geldner, Kellens š́iiaoϑna.
